Ingredients.1: 4 large  naval oranges, peeled and cut into chunks

Ingredients.2: 4 large apples, cored and cut into chunks

Ingredients.4: 1 (3 ounce) package strawberry flavored Jell-O® mix

Directions.1: Place oranges into a food processor bowl; pulse 2 or 3 times until chopped. Transfer fruit to a large bowl. Repeat with apples, then with cranberries. Place all chopped fruit into the same bowl.

Directions.2: Stir sugar, pecans, and gelatin mix into fruit mixture until well combined. Cover and refrigerate until set, at least 4 hours.
